attributes.action: Make Stuart Wheeler a Lord so he can sit in the House of Lords - he deserves it for fighting for us the British people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This man has earned the right to sit in the House of Lords - he was the peoples only voice against this tragedy of the Lisbon treaty - he used his own money for the the fight - he was the only voice for the people = he won the first round, lost the second, but God willing he will win the third round and save the UK from Europe - Honour this man for his efforts
